title: Spatial stories for bold AI brands
description: Immersive imagery, conversational companions, and live narrative layers for pianos, ateliers, and research labs ready to feel more cinematic.

narrative.title: AI Imagery
narrative.body: Gallery-grade visuals styled for Montague Pianos and modern luxury partners, keeping every drop coherent across site, socials, and stage.

narrative.title: Conversational Companions
narrative.body: Chatbots that speak in your cadence, from concert booking assistants to archive docents guiding collectors through living catalogues.

narrative.title: Story Engines
narrative.body: Scroll-triggered essays and GSAP theatre that keep visitors inside a single flowing narrative, blending copy, motion, and score.
